channel.title: Shop making
channel.description:
i posted thread some below but then i saw this shop making guide, i tried 2 olow it and 1st stage of it was 2 open .cfg file,
and i dont know how to open them...
can someone help me plz?

item.title: Shop making
item.dc:creator: @mickey-carter mickey-carter
item.description:
@mickey-carter wrote:

[quote=“sickedank, post:2, topic:198047”]just double click it…

Then click on the “Select a program from a list”

Then select “Notepad”

Also, where you select the notepad application, there should be a checkbox saying “Always use this” or something similar. Check that so it automatically opens.[/quote]

ty

Read full topic

item.title: Shop making
item.dc:creator: @sickedank sickedank
item.description:
@sickedank wrote:

just double click it…

Then click on the “Select a program from a list”

Then select “Notepad”

Also, where you select the notepad application, there should be a checkbox saying “Always use this” or something similar. Check that so it automatically opens.
